spirit:component.spirit:name: spdif_0

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: FREQ_HZ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: AXI4-Stream global clock signal in transmit mode

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: FREQ_HZ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: The AXI4-Stream global clock signal in receive mode.All streaming signals are sampled on the rising edge of this clock

spirit:component.spirit:description: S/PDIF is an audio controller which has interface to master through AXI streaming and to AXI4-Lite.This core works as a transmitter or as a receiver based on the selected mode.
